title: secure connectin failed error code SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG
content:
Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to aadhaar.jharkhand.gov.in:8055. SSL received a record that exceeded the maximum permissible length.

Error code: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Learn moreâ€¦
creator: pappuamlo

title: Disable update notification firefox v.110
content: How to turn off the annoying frequent update notifications? Firefox v.110, Windows 11
creator: gsm600

title: policies.json nor working
content:
Hi,

My policies.json file is installed in my 'distribution' folder alongside FirefoxPortable.exe and the Data folders in the root of the Firefox portable install folder.

It looks like this:

{ 

"policies": {   "PrimaryPassword": true,   "BlockAboutConfig": true,   "PromptForDownloadLocation": true,   "SanitizeOnShutdown": {      "Cache": true,      "OfflineApps": true },   "Preferences": {      "browser.startup.page": {        "Value": 3,        "Status": "user"       }   } }

}

None of the policies are being applied, and on the page <about:policies> I'm getting "The Enterprise Policies service is inactive".

Others have said this was caused by having the following registry keys in the registry, which is not the case in my registry after checking:

Computer\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Mozilla\Firefox\ Computer\HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Policies\Mozilla\Firefox\

Thanks.
creator: d.e.a.newton

title: Hardware acceleration for video not working since 109
content:
On my machine (windows 7 x86 - AMD HD 6670) hardware acceleration for video seems to be disfunctional since Firefox 109. Im using Firefox Portable Version. with Firefox 108.0.2 GPU acceleration for Video was still working. after upgrading to 109 - with the same profile data, addons, settings, drivers etc. - it is not working anymore.

Example Video: https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x770v7x

With Firefox 108.0.2 and ESR 102.8 playback of the above video is accelerated by GPU on my machine. Since Firefox 109 and following versions it is not...

Because i did not changed any configuration before updating to 109 it is obvious that 109 and the following versions do not support video acceleration in my environment anymore. but why..?
creator: faded1

title: Spell checking (how to make settings permanent)
content: How do I make the Spell Checking settings permanent? I'd like it to keep British English and Brazilian Portuguese as permanent settings, whenever I set them every now and then it returns to American English. Also, is it possible to delete the American English language/dictionary? How? Thank you.
creator: wanthuyr

title: Stop trashing my work with your "updates"
content: quit ruining my years of work arghhh
creator: dwaine5460

title: thumbwheel scroll not working
content:
I recently updated the browser to 110.0.1 hoping that the bug that was introduced in the previous update was fixed but it has not yet. Please could you advise me what options are available to me?

Fault: thumbwheel scroll not working on Firefox since previous update.

I had considered performing a fresh install but I do not want to lose my stored passwords, bookmarks etc.

Thanks.

title: unfriend finder
content:
i have and like unfriend finder and every time i refresh or reinstall Firefox it does not work something about a container what is it and how do i get it 

 i have tried contacting the developer please help. it says in setting  it needs a concertinaUnfriend Finder for Facebook 	 


how do  i get one
creator: mdm54

title: how can I add specific shortcut links to firefox homepage on a pc
content: My homepage has shortcut links to various sites. Those which I visit frequently I have pinned to the page. I would like to be able to add and pin other websites to the page. The only option that appears to available is to go through all the unwanted ones to dismiss them and wait on serendipity to produce the ones I want to keep. All the advice online to the same question is support for Android.
creator: debroos

title: Default>Storage folder: Website storage and addon devouring hard drive
content:
Hi,

The default storage folder (alone) in my Firefox portable install is 1.29 GB and still growing. I know this is where website store data, and addons sometimes use this folder as well.

The folder grows so fast it is rendering my Firefox install almost unusable every three or four months. Is there any way to limit the size of this folder?

Regarding addons in that folder, most are very small (kilobytes range), but one rogue addon is 370 MB in size and still growing. It's folder in default>storage is "moz-extension+++d215ed11-a9b2-4927-bd1f-9755184bbe53"

How can I find out which addon this folder belongs to so I can remove the addon (or try and limit how much storage space it uses)?

Thanks.
creator: d.e.a.newton

title: Wordpress Login Redirect Hangs
content:
Hi, I cannot use wordpress.com. When I click on "log in" it hangs at the redirect and I only get a blank screen.

(Hangs here:) https://wordpress.com/log-in?redirect_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwordpress.com%2F

I've disabled all extensions, cleared cookies and restarted, nothing seems to work. Any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks!
creator: gojohnny2019

title: Firefox crashes why I fold my x360 laptop to a tablet
content: More of a bug that needs fixing, I have a hp elitebook x360 1040 and every time I fold my laptop to tablet, the browser crashes. I have to launch the browser again, kindly fix.
creator: jessenkogi

title: No audio / video in Firefox 110 Ubuntu - Chrome 110 works fine
content:
These websites won't play audio or video in Firefox 110.0.1, they work in Chrome 110.0.5481.177

https://www.vrt.be/vrtnu/livestream/audio/stubru/ When I click the Play button I get an error "Oops, something went wrong, error code 200" which seems to be a general error code. In Chrome the music starts playing instantly.

https://f1tv.formula1.com/ I have a subscription but video won't play. I can press the Play button, sometimes I see a preloader but the screen stays black, no audio or video. In Chrome the content just starts playing, be it live or recorded content.

Steps I took to get audio/video working inb Firefox, but to no avail:

run above websites in private tabs download Firefox again and run it from its folder in Downloads start Firefox in Troubelshoot mode start Firefox in Troubleshoot mode and Refresh Firefox disabled / enabled Plugin Widevine Content Decryption Module provided by Google Inc disabled / enabled Play DRM-controlled content in Settings disabled / enabled Enhanced Tracking protection disablde / enabled allow media autoplay

In other discussions it was opted to remove the PulseAudio config by running the below command and rebooting rm ~/.config/pulse/*

Any help to get this working again would be greatly appreciated!
creator: NeoRey

title: lost bookmarks and saved passwords
content:
i lost my bookmarks and saved passwords data saved in my account by resetting the password.

Please help me how to get my bookmarks and saved passwords data.
creator: rk.gone

title: Lost Mozilla
content: Hi, I had firefox installed on my Laptop and I also had Norton anti virus running in the background. Norton asked me to renew but I thought it was a wasted of money. I unistalled Norton but it has taked firefox and my my passwords and bookmarks with it ?
creator: chrisdev21

title: Too much spacing between words everywhere in Firefox
content:
So I installed Firefox a while ago and tried it out, was pretty nice but didn't have a couple features at the time so I uninstalled it. Recently I was thinking of going back to Firefox for a bit since some extensions I wanted was working on Firefox again so I reinstalled it. After opening Firefox the whole UI is a mess with words having too much spacing between each other everywhere including Google searches, Firefox settings etc. Mozilla's webpage itself and YouTube didn't seem to be broken but that's about the only one sI've seen that is not broken. Haven't really used the browser because of this issue so not sure what other sites don't have the issue. Not sure how to better describe this so I'm attaching a few images, thanks to anyone who's willing to help me with this.

For a few things I've tried, it was trying to start in safe mode, removing the ~/.mozilla folder and reinstalling firefox. Other than that not sure what to try so any help would be appreciated.

OS: Arch Linux Firefox version: 110.0.1

It's a laptop so it has Intel Integrated graphics along with a GTX 1660Ti Mobile as the dedicated GPU. Not sure what other details to provide so let me know what to give and I'll be happy to do so :)
creator: ArchUser93

title: "Saved Passwords"
content:
Really enjoy how when I try to go into an old email account, Firefox can ask me if i want save the new password, when I'm trying to guess, BUT won't let me know what the password is!

Shouldn't you have bought me dinner first, BEFORE treating me like that?
creator: pjanits3

title: Firefox windows crashing., and it is SLOW to respond
content:
Using 110.0.1 64 bit .. Clean Install Windows 10, 32 gb memory, 1 tb m2 ssd on a ROG Mb 2070 video card

Since the last update Firefox is slow, it hangs - gives the stupid error code 'this is embarrassing', if you walk away from the terminal to do other work and come back the window freezes, mouse moves everywhere but clicking does nothing. This is more than frustrating because have to re open all the windows waiting. and for you guys information the only thing running is adblock as far as an extension is concerned. Not only that. if I run ookla speed test through this version of the browser its no where near the speed I pay for, upload is near 789 and download 10. If I keep Firefox running and open an Edge page and run the same speed test from edge I get 805 and 39.88

What gives, why the heck are you so much slower and why are your updates so often and then causing the thing to hang... ? I am frustrated to the point of now switching out of Firefox, remember Netscape? well you all are fast meeting the same goals . unreliable and slow.
creator: michaepr

title: Firefox won't let me save new Credit Card info
content: I deleted a bunch of old credit cards (all except one)and tried adding a new one, but Firefox (for Windows) won't let me save a new credit card after I enter it. The Save button dims a sec to show the computer acknowledges it and no error statements pop up. FWIW The authentication security setting is off. Please help.
creator: SuziRider

title: Best Homepage Ever
content: I use besthomepageever.com as my homepage. When I open Firefox it automatically opens. Today, all I get is a white blank page. I have tried turning off all extensions - that did not work. If I open besthomepageever.com in Edge, it opens correctly to the sign-on page.
creator: SBNM

title: Hoe Do I Make Firefox Stop Running In The Background?
content:
I have Windows 11 Home Laptop lately the battery is draining pretty fast. Then i got a notification saying Firefox is using an unusual amount of your battery in the background. It says Firefox is using 78% of the battery in the background this much drainage from one app can harm the battery. It's suggestion is to kill the background process of Firefox or uninstall it and use another browser.

I have tried to figure out how to stop it but can't I have found it before in msconfig but its not there. I looked in the start-up process it is not there. I looked in the running apps i found it but it will not let me kill its process it tells me Firefox is a necessary Windows operating system application. I know that is not true. I have read where other people are having this same issue that started with Firefox 109 .

My Firefox is running 110.0.1 I need to get this to stop running in the background. can anyone please help me figure this out?

Thank You
creator: Mr.Bobcat
